member.name: T:ImageProcessor
member.summary: Provides methods for image processing operations.

member.name: M:ImageProcessor.Inverse(System.String[])
member.summary: Inverts the colors of the specified images and saves the inverted versions.
member.param: An array of image filenames to process.
member.remarks: The output images will be saved in the same directory as the original images, using the following naming convention: <original_file_name>_inverse.<original_file_extension> The original images will not be overwritten.
